text: It is impossible for Labour's new Defence statement to unite the movement as the Labour leaders are not only in favour of American bases, but are in favour of German bases and troops being trained on British soil. The new Defence statement, while accepting that Britain cannot remain an independent nuclear Power, now supports the policy of depending on American nuclear weapons and the H-bomb, placing Britain in an even more dangerous position.
